product_name: Ellington Annie Mini Crossbody Handbag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Though it's small in stature, the Ellington Annie Mini Crossbody Handbag is big in convenience, a boon for your travels downtown or around the world. Made of durable, lightweight nylon with quilted top flap and sturdy gunmetal-gray hardware. Main compartment zips closed; flap has a magnetic closure. Organizer section underneath the flap has a slip pocket and mesh zipper pocket. Strap of the Ellington Annie Mini Crossbody Handbag adjusts to shoulder bag or cross-body length. Closeout.
short_description: Though it's small in stature, the Ellington Annie Mini Crossbody Handbag is big in convenience, a boon for your travels downtown or around the world.
